short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support creators instantly using Bitcoin Lightning Network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Integrate instant Bitcoin Lightning donations into your browser. Currently we support YouTube and Twitter and more services support on coming.
Just install it, connect a Bitcoin Lightning wallet or fulfill your balance with satoshis and start supporting content creators on YouTube and Twitter. 
Under any YouTube video or a tweet a lightning bolt button appears that allows one-click donations using the Bitcoin Lightning network.
Direct donations to lightning addresses are also supported.
Also, you can hold a button to increase a donation amount.
